"Go not forth hastily to strive, lest thou know not what to do in the end thereof, when thy neighbor hath 
                                                                           499
put thee to shame. Debate thy cause with thy neighbor himself; and discover not a secret to another." [Proverbs 25:8, 9.] Do not suffer sin upon your brother; but do not expose him, and thus increase the difficulty, making the reproof seem like a revenge. Correct him in the way outlined in the word of God.
